com.googlecode.gwtgl.array
Class DataView

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.googlecode.gwtgl.array.ArrayBufferView
          com.googlecode.gwtgl.array.DataView

public class DataView
extends ArrayBufferView

A DataView is an ArrayBufferView with no concrete type to read and write values. The DataView provides read and write methods for all types supported by the TypedArrays.

Author:
Steffen Sch√§fer
